Flow.label: Assignment 50 || Final Assignment | Automated Credit Card Application Approval

fields.name: Do_you_have_want_any_bank_accounts
fields.fieldText: Do you have want any bank accounts?

fields.name: displayMsg2
fields.fieldText:
﻿Nice to Meet you,Engin.Let us know Where you Live so we can verify your identity.

You can add a mailing address later so we know where to send your card.

fields.name: Residential_Address_P_O_box_is_not_valid
fields.fieldText: Residential Address (P.O.box is not valid)

fields.name: App_suite_if_applicable
fields.fieldText: App/ suite(if applicable)

fields.name: displayMsg9
fields.fieldText:
One last step to see if you're eligible.

You need your aggrement to the following terms.

This tool may show cards that have terms,features, and eligibility requirements that differ from our cards available elsewhere.

fields.name: Electronic_Communications
fields.fieldText: Electronic Communications

fields.name: displayMsgElectronicCom
fields.fieldText: I have reviewed and agree to the terms of the Electronic Communications Disclosure.I confirm that I will receive communications regarding credit card offer eligibility by electronic means only.I confirm that I have the ability to save or print web pages.

fields.name: Credit_inquiry_authorization
fields.fieldText: Credit inquiry authorization

fields.name: displayMsgCreditAUT
fields.fieldText:
By checking this box, I am providing written instructions to Capital One under the federal Fair Credit Reporting Act and applicable state law,authorizing Capital One to obtain information about me today from consumer reporting agencies, and Demand Deposit Account data,such as checking account information ,to determine if I am eligible for credit card offer(s) today anf in future.I am aauthorizing Capital One to use consumer report information that it collects for analysis and to otherwise improve the product and services if offers.I understand that Capital One's privacy policies apply to the data that I am submitting and I understand that this is not a credit card application.

﻿

Seeing if you're pre-approved wont hurt your credit score.If you decıde to apply for a card you're pre-approved for,your credit score may be impacted when you submit the appication.

fields.name: successMsg
fields.fieldText:
Congratulations! Your Credit Card Application Has Been APPROVED

Dear {!Legal_First_Name} {!Legal_Last_Name},

We are thrilled to inform you that your appication hass been approved!

Here are your temporary card details,which you can use immediately for your purchases until your physical card arrives;

fields.name: displayMsg3
fields.fieldText:
﻿Let us know How to Communicate with You.

If you become a customer,we'll notify you via text,email or Phone if we notice potential suspicious transaction on your account.Ypu can opt out it any time.

fields.name: Phone_Type
fields.fieldText: Phone Type

fields.name: What_is_the_Highest_Level_education_you_ve_completed
fields.fieldText: What is the Highest Level education you've completed?

fields.name: Skip_this_question
fields.fieldText: Skip this question

fields.name: What_is_Your_Employment_status
fields.fieldText: What is Your Employment status?

fields.name: displayMsg6
fields.fieldText:
Let's get a snapshot of your financial situation.

We use this information to match you to the right product.Changing this information later in the application process could affect your approvel chances.

We use this information to match you to the right product.Changing this information later in the application process could affect your approvel chances.

fields.name: Total_annual_income
fields.fieldText: Total annual income
fields.helpText: (Total Annual Income):  You may include personal income, which is income you have earned, including full-time, part-time, or seasonal jobs, self-employment, interest or dividends, retirement, and public assistance. You may also include shared income, which is money from somebody else that is regularly deposited into your individual account or into a joint account that person shares with you. If you are 21 or over, you may also include somebody else's income that is regularly used to pay your expenses.

fields.name: displayMsgTotalAnnual
fields.fieldText: You don't need to include alimony,child support or separate maintenance income if you don't want if considered as part of your ability to make payments.

fields.name: Monthly_rent_mortgage
fields.fieldText: Monthly rent/mortgage

fields.name: displayMsgMontlyrent
fields.fieldText: Enter the amount you pay individually for hpusing,excluding utilities.If someone alse pays for you,enter $0

fields.name: displayMsg8
fields.fieldText: You are almost done!Help us protect you from fraud and verify your identity.

fields.name: Date_of_Birth
fields.fieldText: Date of Birth

validationRule.errorMessage: Date of Birth must be entered and you must be at least 18 years old.

fields.name: Social_Security_Number
fields.fieldText: Social Security Number

validationRule.errorMessage: Please write in this format: 'XXX-XX-XXXX', where X is a digit from 0-9

fields.name: notApprovedMsg
fields.fieldText:
Thank you,{!$User.FirstName}


We reviewed your information and,unfortunately,we can't pre-approve you for a Bank of PTS consumer credit card at this time.
